name: Myteka 4mg tablet
description: Myteka 4mg tablet is a medication produced by Hilton that contains the active ingredient Montelukast. It belongs to a class of drugs known as leukotriene receptor antagonists, which work by blocking the action of certain natural substances in the body that cause inflammation. This medication is available in the form of oral tablets and is used to prevent and treat asthma symptoms, seasonal allergies, and exercise-induced bronchoconstriction.
label: medicine
